pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tabulate Descriptive Statistics in Multiple Formats // Creates a table of descriptive statistics for factor and numeric columns in a data frame. Displays these by groups, if any. Highly customizable, with support for 'html' and 'pdf' provided by 'kableExtra'. Respects original column order, column labels, and factor level order. See ?tablet.data.frame and vignettes.
